body:
This online form puts small files (known as ‘cookies’) onto your computer to collect information about how you browse the site.

Cookies are used to:

* remember your progress
* measure how you use the website so it can be updated and improved based on your needs

The cookies on this online form aren't used to identify you personally.

You'll normally see a message on the site before we store a cookie on your computer.

Find out more about [how to manage cookies](https://www.aboutcookies.org/).

## How cookies are used on this online form

We will store a cookie to remember your progress in this computer and to expire your session after 30 minutes of inactivity or when you close your browser.
heading: Cookies
